title: Mayor Garcetti Announces Solar Pilot Project To Reduce Energy Use, Provide Power To First-Responders In ...
text: ( Source : Office of Los Angeles Mayor ) U.S. Secretary of Energy joins Mayor to announce disaster preparedness pilot and release U.S. Department of Energy report ' Climate Change and the U.S. Energy Sector.' Mayor Eric Garcetti today announced
